content.raw: I'll chime in and echo @rmerriam. I'm not optimistic about getting everything working.  There's a lot to learn and figure out with little time left.  The code freeze that was frequently requested seems not to have happened.  I'll repeat myself and say that it's clear there is a lot of excellent work going into getting things prepared for the competition, but it's difficult to engineer solutions for such a fast moving target.
content.html: I'll chime in and echo @rmerriam. I'm not optimistic about getting everything working. There's a lot to learn and figure out with little time left. The code freeze that was frequently requested seems not to have happened. I'll repeat myself and say that it's clear there is a lot of excellent work going into getting things prepared for the competition, but it's difficult to engineer solutions for such a fast moving target.
